context.p: Examine the vent system every six months. Points of inspection are as follows:

step.cmd: Check for obstructions and/or deterioration of the intake-air and/or vent piping and the intake-air and vent terminations. Replace immediately where needed.
The debris screens in the intake-air and vent terminations should be cleaned of foreign material and soot. See .

info.note: Do not reach inside the vent termination when the heater is in operation.

step.cmd: Check all vent-system connections for leakage and repair or reseal as necessary.
Inspect and clean the built-in condensate trap of any debris. See and .
